OrgName.entry: ECCLESALL LIBRARY READING GROUPS FOR CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE

Desc.entry: A wide range of reading groups for children and young people aged from 9 to 17 years.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: 3rd Mon in the month 3.45-5pm (a Chatterbooks reading group for children aged 9-10 years), 3rd Wed in the month 3.45-5pm (Book Chat, a reading group for young people aged 13-17 years, drop-in)
